text: George Handley (1868–1938) was an English footballer who played in the Football League for Derby County and Notts County. ==References== Category:1868 births Category:1938 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:English Football League players Category:Loughborough F.C. players Category:Notts County F.C. players Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:Coalville Town F.C. players Category:Northampton Town F.C. players Category:Newark Town F.C. players
title: George Handley (footballer, born 1868)
